name: Stories From The Nerve Sketchbook
body:
### Welcome
 Part of an art installation with the Harvestworks International Artists' Collective.  This code retrieves #harvestworks tagged tweets from Twitter and sends them to a screen, and to another (not existing here) max patch for audio processing.



### Artists and Contributors
Original work included algorythmic composition by [Joshua Booth](https://soundcloud.com/joshuabooth-1), sculpture by [Minah Park](http://www.minahpark.com/), art direction by Daniel Belquer.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
